properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.as-map
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce maps for the lines values instead of lists. It requires to have header (either defined or collected). The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.comment
properties.description: The comment symbol. The default value is #

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.delimiter
properties.description: The delimiter of values

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.empty-value
properties.description: The String representation of an empty value

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the univocityCsv data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.header-extraction-enabled
properties.description: Whether or not the header must be read in the first line of the test document The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.headers-disabled
properties.description: Whether or not the headers are disabled. When defined, this option explicitly sets the headers as null which indicates that there is no header. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.ignore-leading-whitespaces
properties.description: Whether or not the leading white spaces must be ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.ignore-trailing-whitespaces
properties.description: Whether or not the trailing white spaces must ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.lazy-load
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce an iterator that reads the lines on the fly or if all the lines must be read at one. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.line-separator
properties.description: The line separator of the files The default value is to use the JVM platform line separator

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.normalized-line-separator
properties.description: The normalized line separator of the files The default value is a new line character.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.null-value
properties.description: The string representation of a null value. The default value is null

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.number-of-records-to-read
properties.description: The maximum number of record to read.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.quote
properties.description: The quote symbol.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.quote-all-fields
properties.description: Whether or not all values must be quoted when writing them.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.quote-escape
properties.description: The quote escape symbol

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitycsv.skip-empty-lines
properties.description: Whether or not the empty lines must be ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.as-map
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce maps for the lines values instead of lists. It requires to have header (either defined or collected). The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.comment
properties.description: The comment symbol. The default value is #

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.empty-value
properties.description: The String representation of an empty value

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the univocityFixed data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.header-extraction-enabled
properties.description: Whether or not the header must be read in the first line of the test document The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.headers-disabled
properties.description: Whether or not the headers are disabled. When defined, this option explicitly sets the headers as null which indicates that there is no header. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.ignore-leading-whitespaces
properties.description: Whether or not the leading white spaces must be ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.ignore-trailing-whitespaces
properties.description: Whether or not the trailing white spaces must ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.lazy-load
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce an iterator that reads the lines on the fly or if all the lines must be read at one. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.line-separator
properties.description: The line separator of the files The default value is to use the JVM platform line separator

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.normalized-line-separator
properties.description: The normalized line separator of the files The default value is a new line character.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.null-value
properties.description: The string representation of a null value. The default value is null

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.number-of-records-to-read
properties.description: The maximum number of record to read.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.padding
properties.description: The padding character. The default value is a space

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.record-ends-on-newline
properties.description: Whether or not the record ends on new line. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.skip-empty-lines
properties.description: Whether or not the empty lines must be ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocityfixed.skip-trailing-chars-until-newline
properties.description: Whether or not the trailing characters until new line must be ignored. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.as-map
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce maps for the lines values instead of lists. It requires to have header (either defined or collected). The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.comment
properties.description: The comment symbol. The default value is #

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.empty-value
properties.description: The String representation of an empty value

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the univocityTsv data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.escape-char
properties.description: The escape character.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.header-extraction-enabled
properties.description: Whether or not the header must be read in the first line of the test document The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.headers-disabled
properties.description: Whether or not the headers are disabled. When defined, this option explicitly sets the headers as null which indicates that there is no header. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.ignore-leading-whitespaces
properties.description: Whether or not the leading white spaces must be ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.ignore-trailing-whitespaces
properties.description: Whether or not the trailing white spaces must ignored. The default value is true

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.lazy-load
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce an iterator that reads the lines on the fly or if all the lines must be read at one. The default value is false

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.line-separator
properties.description: The line separator of the files The default value is to use the JVM platform line separator

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.normalized-line-separator
properties.description: The normalized line separator of the files The default value is a new line character.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.null-value
properties.description: The string representation of a null value. The default value is null

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.number-of-records-to-read
properties.description: The maximum number of record to read.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.univocitytsv.skip-empty-lines
properties.description: Whether or not the empty lines must be ignored. The default value is true
